column5: I am trying to book the first wek of september on the gouin reservoir. i think i have narrowed it down to these two camps. Anyone been there this year? If so how was the fishing/accomodations? Ant feedback would be greatly appreciated thanks guys jale6666
Believe me....forget about achimac, if you really want to quality fishing and accomodation

i went there last week and a get fish for my two permit i eat some and have a great time my my wife and friends if you want to get some fish just fish the way the guide tell you if you try to fish you way you have a chanche to get less ps fish with leach have a good trip hope you go there just say that was tracy dad ho told you that

The gouin is a great fishery, now you just have to pick were you will be most comfortable, call both outfitters refurances, that should tell you if an outfitter does not give his people to call go to the other. just my three cents worth
